title: India court gives New Delhi three days to come up with plan to fight pollution
text:
Published By: Reuters - Environment - Today 
NEW DELHI (Reuters) - India's Supreme Court has given New Delhi three days to come up with a plan to clean up the air in a city ranked by th...
